overview:
## Discussion

This issue can occur when calling [doc://org.swift.testing/documentation/Testing/confirmation(_:expectedCount:isolation:sourceLocation:_:)-5mqz2] or [doc://org.swift.testing/documentation/Testing/confirmation(_:expectedCount:isolation:sourceLocation:_:)-l3il] when the confirmation passed to these functions’ `body` closures is confirmed too few or too many times.

# Issue.Kind.confirmationMiscounted(actual:expected:)

**Case**

An issue due to a confirmation being confirmed the wrong number of times.

## Declaration

```swift
indirect case confirmationMiscounted(actual: Int, expected: any RangeExpression & Sendable)
```

## Parameters

- **actual**: The number of times [doc://org.swift.testing/documentation/Testing/Confirmation/confirm(count:)] was actually called.
- **expected**: The expected number of times [doc://org.swift.testing/documentation/Testing/Confirmation/confirm(count:)] should have been called.

## Discussion

This issue can occur when calling [doc://org.swift.testing/documentation/Testing/confirmation(_:expectedCount:isolation:sourceLocation:_:)-5mqz2] or [doc://org.swift.testing/documentation/Testing/confirmation(_:expectedCount:isolation:sourceLocation:_:)-l3il] when the confirmation passed to these functions’ `body` closures is confirmed too few or too many times.
title: Issue.Kind.confirmationMiscounted(actual:expected:)
